channel.title: How to optimize my coding abilities? [PI]
channel.description: Hey guys, ILS here and I have a question to ask you. I'm not gunna lie, I'm a n00b at coding. But cut me some slack please, because I'm only 13 and just got into coding a few weeks ago. I can do the simple things. Like making commands, adding global objects, simple teleports, just the n00b stuff. I want to know more. I want to be like most of the pros up here, being able to write a whole god dang script off the top of their head while they're at work or watching tv. I know you don't want to here my whole life story, but here I go: If anybody knows any beginners guide to understanding coding, A link would be very helpful. I looked on google for how to code Runescape Private Servers, but random tutorials of random things just kept coming up. Please don't flame me because I didn't know where to put this... (By the way: my server that I'm working on is Project Insanity and that was the first kind of coding I ever done so that's what I'm used to)

item.title: How to optimize my coding abilities? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

Watch someone ‘code’ on team viewer and whenever something pops up you don’t understand ask them. I know a few people who did this and it helps.

http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/

Now for your first program… do some math.

Read full topic
item.source: How to optimize my coding abilities? [PI]

Hey guys, ILS here and I have a question to ask you. I’m not gunna lie, I’m a n00b at coding. But cut me some slack please, because I’m only 13 and just got into coding a few weeks ago. I want to be like most of the pros up here, being able to write a whole god dang script off the top of their head while they’re at work or watching tv. I know you don’t want to here my whole life story, but here I go: If anybody knows any beginners guide to understanding coding, A link would be very helpful. I looked on google for how to code Runescape Private Servers, but random tutorials of random things just kept coming up. Please don’t flame me because I didn’t know where to put this… (By the way: my server that I’m working on is Project Insanity and that was the first kind of coding I ever done so that’s what I’m used to)
